attributes.title: Non-Violence Is The Real Heroism!
attributes.description:
13 JUL 2020 - NITHYANANDA SATSANG

*DIRECT MESSAGE FROM PARAMASHIVA FROM KAILASA:

*THE GOOD NEWS IS - YOUR MENTAL SETUP, THE MIND YOU BUILT, IS WITH A MIXTURE OF SOME DELUSIONAL BELIEFS, FALSE HOPES, FALSE SECURITIES, BLIND SPOTS, AND SOME TRUE POWERFUL, REAL COGNITIONS. FOR A COMMON MAN, THE POWERFUL COGNITIONS IS A VERY LESS PERCENTAGE. DELUSIONS, HOPES AND BLIND SPOTS ARE A LARGE PERCENTAGE.

*EXAMPLE OF BLIND SPOT: PEOPLE IN ANGER, IN RAGE, SOMETIMES SAY, “COME ON, LET US DO IT AND FACE WHAT COMES AFTER THAT!” BUT WHEN THE RESULT OF WHAT THEY DID COMES, THEY CAN’T FACE! THAT IS WHAT I CALLED BLIND SPOT BASED MENTAL SETUP.

*SOMETIMES, PEOPLE MAKE DECISIONS ARROGANTLY. YOU CAN SEE IN INDIAN MOVIES, CONSTANTLY THIS INDIAN CINEMA IS TEACHING VIOLENCE AS HEROISM. SO MUCH VIOLENCE IS NOT REQUIRED TO RUN YOUR LIFE. BUT IT IS SO UNFORTUNATE THAT INDIAN CINEMA MAKES YOU BELIEVE, ONLY IF YOU ARE VIOLENT YOU CAN SURVIVE... WHICH IS NOT TRUE.

*IT IS ALL ABOUT TRIGGERING THE NEGATIVITY, FRICTION, AMONG HUMAN BEINGS AND ENCASHING THE CHEAP EMOTIONS, AND MAKING MONEY. IT IS THE CHEAPEST BUSINESS.

*I HAVE ALWAYS SEEN IN INDIAN CINEMA: THE HERO WILL SAY, “KILL THAT FELLOW! COME WHAT MAY, WE WILL FACE IT!” LATER, WHEN HE IS ARRESTED AND PUT IN JAIL HE WILL NOT BE ABLE TO FACE IT! THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT THEY ARE TEACHING INDIAN YOUTH AND THE YOUTH BEHAVE THE SAME WAY. IT IS THE BLIND SPOT-BASED THINKING!

*THIS BLIND SPOT-BASED THINKING AND MENTAL SYSTEM WILL COLLAPSE NOW IN THIS PRALAYA. ACTUALLY, NONVIOLENCE IS THE REAL HEROISM.

*WE SHOULD TEACH OUR NEXT GENERATION HOW TO TAKE THE NONVIOLENCE AND BLISSFUL COEXISTENCE TO YOUR CORE LEVEL. ALL THESE VIOLENCE-CENTRIC HEROISM AND VIOLENCE-CENTRIC HERO WORSHIP STORIES, EVERYTHING SHOULD BE MOVED AWAY FROM THE NEXT GENERATION.

*VIOLENCE SHOULD NOT BE TAUGHT AS HEROISM. MAKING YOURSELF RICH, HAPPY, BLISSFUL THROUGH HAPPY COEXISTENCE... THAT SHOULD BE THE LIFESTYLE AND THAT IS ONLY GOING TO BE THE FUTURE. YOUTH IS NOT GOING TO ANYMORE BELIEVE THE VIOLENCE INSTIGATING IDEOLOGIES.

*IT IS TIME HUMAN BEINGS BECOME MATURED. THIS PRALAYA IS GOING TO TEACH A LESSON TO ALL HUMAN BEINGS.

*REALLY, THE MEAT INDUSTRY SHOULD DISAPPEAR FROM PLANET EARTH. THIS PRALAYA IS GOING TO REMOVE THE MEAT INDUSTRY AND MAKE VEGETARIANISM AS A MAINSTREAM LIFESTYLE.

*ALL THE BLIND SPOT-BASED THINKING, DELUSION-BASED THINKING, FALSE IDEA OF SECURITY, WILL MELT DOWN. THE EARLIER YOU REMOVE ALL THIS FROM YOUR LIFE, GREAT FOR YOU!

*SOME OF THE THINGS I AM REPEATING CONTINUOUSLY AND I AM GOING TO REPEAT CONTINUOUSLY FOR NEXT FEW DAYS TILL IT REACHES EVERYONE BECAUSE THESE ARE THE FIRST PRINCIPLES TO SURVIVE THIS PRALAYA.

*ALL OF YOU HAVE A GREAT POSSIBILITY. THIS SITUATION HAPPENING EXTERNALLY AND ITS IMPACT INSIDE YOU, CAN BE BEAUTIFULLY USED AND YOU CAN BECOME ENLIGHTENED; YOU CAN HAVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH, BECAUSE ALL PEER PRESSURE IS TAKEN AWAY! THERE IS NO JEALOUSY, NO COMPARISON! EVERYTHING IS TAKEN AWAY!

*LOTS OF FALSE THINGS ARE MELTING DOWN. LOTS OF LIFE NEGATIVE IDEAS ARE COLLAPSING. THE REAL UNDERSTANDING ABOUT WEALTH IS EMERGING. REAL CLARITY ABOUT STRENGTH IS EMERGING.

*HUMAN BEINGS WILL UNDERSTAND THE NEED FOR CONSCIOUSNESS-BASED LIFESTYLE THROUGH THIS PRALAYA AND EARLIER THE HUMAN BEINGS UNDERSTAND, THE QUICKER THEY WILL SAIL THROUGH THIS PRALAYA WHICH IS HAPPENING NOW...THE GREAT DELUGE!

*EXTREME CHRONIC GREED-BASED ECONOMY, CHRONIC PLEASURE-BASED LIFESTYLE, CHRONIC FEAR-BASED RULING STRUCTURE, EVERYTHING HAS BECOME AN OVERDOSE - WHETHER THE DEPTH OF THE PLEASURE, OR THE FEAR NEEDED TO KEEP THE RULE AND LAW AND ORDER IN SOCIETY, OR GREED THAT NEEDS TO BE INSTIGATED TO KEEP HUMAN BEINGS PRODUCTIVE... ALL OF THIS HAS BECOME EXCESSIVE. IT HAS REACHED TO THE BLIND SPOT LEVEL. IT MEANS, FEAR, WHEN IT CROSSES CERTAIN LIMIT, IT ENTERS INTO YOUR SYSTEM AND EMBOLDENS YOU. YOU SAY, “WHAT CAN BE DONE? OK LET IT BE.” IT BECOMES DELUSIONAL ARROGANCE. EVERYTHING DUE TO ITS EXCESS IS FULLY MESSED UP.

Read More At: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4089249727829513
